verses.verse: The same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> out of the house, <S%G3614><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> by the sea <S%G2281><s%> side. <S%G3844><s%>

And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> to him, so <S%G5620><s%> that he went <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> and sat; <S%G2521><s%> and the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the shore. <S%G123><s%>

And he spoke <S%G2980><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things to them in parables, <S%G3850><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a sower <S%G4687><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> to sow; <S%G4687><s%>

And when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> seeds fell <S%G4098><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side, <S%G3844><s%> and the fowls <S%G4071><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and devoured <S%G2719><s%> them up:

Some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on stony <S%G4075><s%> places, where <S%G3699><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> not much <S%G4183><s%> earth: <S%G1093><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> they sprung <S%G1816><s%> up, because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> deepness <S%G899><s%> of earth: <S%G1093><s%>
And when the sun <S%G2246><s%> was up, they were scorched; <S%G2739><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> they withered <S%G3583><s%> away.
And some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> thorns; <S%G173><s%> and the thorns <S%G173><s%> sprung <S%G305><s%> up, and choked <S%G638><s%> them:

But other <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and brought <S%G1325><s%> forth fruit, <S%G2590><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> an hundred times, <S%G1540><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> sixty times, <S%G1835><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> thirty times. <S%G5144><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Why <S%G1302><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> you to them in parables? <S%G3850><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Because <S%G3754><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%> to you to know <S%G1097><s%> the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but to them it is not given. <S%G1325><s%>

For whoever <S%G3748><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall be given, <S%G1325><s%> and he shall have more abundance: <S%G4052><s%> but whoever <S%G3748><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not, from him shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that he has. <S%G2192><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> I to them in parables: <S%G3850><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they seeing <S%G991><s%> see <S%G991><s%> not; and hearing <S%G191><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%> not, neither <S%G3761><s%> do they understand. <S%G4920><s%>

And in them is fulfilled <S%G378><s%> the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of Esaias, <S%G2268><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> By hearing <S%G189><s%> you shall hear, <S%G191><s%> and shall not understand; <S%G4920><s%> and seeing <S%G991><s%> you shall see, <S%G991><s%> and shall not perceive: <S%G1492><s%>

For this <S%G5127><s%> people's <S%G2992><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is waxed <S%G3975><s%> gross, <S%G3975><s%> and their ears <S%G3775><s%> are dull <S%G917><s%> of hearing, <S%G191><s%> and their eyes <S%G3788><s%> they have closed; <S%G2576><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G3379><s%> they should see <S%G1492><s%> with their eyes <S%G3788><s%> and hear <S%G191><s%> with their ears, <S%G3775><s%> and should understand <S%G4920><s%> with their heart, <S%G2588><s%> and should be converted, <S%G1994><s%> and I should heal <S%G2390><s%> them.
But blessed <S%G3107><s%> are your <S%G5216><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> for they see: <S%G991><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> for they hear. <S%G191><s%>

For truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That many <S%G4183><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> men have desired <S%G1939><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> and have not seen <S%G1492><s%> them; and to hear <S%G191><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> you hear, <S%G191><s%> and have not heard <S%G191><s%> them.
Hear <S%G191><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the sower. <S%G4687><s%>

When any <S%G3956><s%> one hears <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and understands <S%G4920><s%> it not, then comes <S%G2064><s%> the wicked <S%G4190><s%> one, and catches <S%G726><s%> away <S%G726><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> was sown <S%G4687><s%> in his heart. <S%G2588><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is he which <S%G3588><s%> received <S%G4687><s%> seed <S%G4687><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side. <S%G3844><s%>

But he that received <S%G4687><s%> the seed <S%G4687><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> stony <S%G4075><s%> places, the same <S%G3778><s%> is he that hears <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> it;

Yet <S%G1161><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> he not root <S%G4491><s%> in himself, <S%G1438><s%> but endures <S%G2076><s%> for a while: <S%G4340><s%> for when tribulation <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> rises <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word, <S%G3056><s%> by and by he is offended. <S%G4624><s%>

He also <S%G1161><s%> that received <S%G4687><s%> seed <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns <S%G173><s%> is he that hears <S%G191><s%> the word; <S%G3056><s%> and the care <S%G3308><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> and the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches, <S%G4149><s%> choke <S%G4846><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and he becomes <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

But he that received <S%G4687><s%> seed <S%G4687><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%> is he that hears <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and understands <S%G4920><s%> it; which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G1211><s%> bears <S%G2592><s%> fruit, <S%G2592><s%> and brings <S%G4160><s%> forth, <S%G4160><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3033><s%> an hundred times, <S%G1540><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> thirty. <S%G5144><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> put <S%G3908><s%> he forth <S%G3908><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is likened <S%G3666><s%> to a man <S%G444><s%> which sowed <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in his field: <S%G68><s%>

But while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> men <S%G444><s%> slept, <S%G2518><s%> his enemy <S%G2190><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and sowed <S%G4687><s%> tares <S%G2215><s%> among <S%G303><s%> <S%G3319><s%> the wheat, <S%G4621><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> his way.

But when <S%G3753><s%> the blade <S%G5528><s%> was sprung <S%G985><s%> up, and brought <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the householder <S%G3617><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Sir, <S%G2962><s%> did not you sow <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in your field? <S%G68><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> it tares? <S%G2215><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, An enemy <S%G2190><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> this. <S%G5124><s%> The servants <S%G1401><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, Will <S%G2309><s%> you then <S%G3767><s%> that we go <S%G565><s%> and gather <S%G4816><s%> them up?

But he said, <S%G5346><s%> No; <S%G3756><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> while you gather <S%G4816><s%> up the tares, <S%G2215><s%> you root <S%G1610><s%> up also <S%G260><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> with them.

Let <S%G863><s%> both <S%G297><s%> grow <S%G4885><s%> together <S%G4885><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> the harvest: <S%G2326><s%> and in the time <S%G2540><s%> of harvest <S%G2326><s%> I will say <S%G2046><s%> to the reapers, <S%G2327><s%> Gather <S%G4816><s%> you together <S%G4816><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the tares, <S%G2215><s%> and bind <S%G1210><s%> them in bundles <S%G1197><s%> to burn <S%G2618><s%> them: but gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my barn. <S%G596><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> put <S%G3908><s%> he forth <S%G3908><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and sowed <S%G4687><s%> in his field: <S%G68><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> is the least <S%G3398><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> seeds: <S%G4690><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> it is grown, <S%G837><s%> it is the greatest <S%G3187><s%> among herbs, <S%G3001><s%> and becomes <S%G1096><s%> a tree, <S%G1186><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and lodge <S%G2681><s%> in the branches <S%G2798><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

Another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> he to them; The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to leaven, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> in three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of meal, <S%G224><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to the multitude <S%G3793><s%> in parables; <S%G3850><s%> and without <S%G5565><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> he not to them:

That it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will open <S%G455><s%> my mouth <S%G4750><s%> in parables; <S%G3850><s%> I will utter <S%G2044><s%> things which have been kept secret <S%G2928><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G863><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G863><s%> and went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house: <S%G3614><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Declare <S%G5419><s%> to us the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the tares <S%G2215><s%> of the field. <S%G68><s%>
He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, He that sows <S%G4687><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man; <S%G444><s%>

The field <S%G68><s%> is the world; <S%G2889><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> are the children <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom; <S%G932><s%> but the tares <S%G2215><s%> are the children <S%G5207><s%> of the wicked <S%G4190><s%> one;

The enemy <S%G2190><s%> that sowed <S%G4687><s%> them is the devil; <S%G1228><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> is the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world; <S%G165><s%> and the reapers <S%G2327><s%> are the angels. <S%G32><s%>

As therefore <S%G3767><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%> are gathered <S%G4816><s%> and burned <S%G2618><s%> in the fire; <S%G4442><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be in the end <S%G4930><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world. <S%G165><s%>

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall send <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> his angels, <S%G32><s%> and they shall gather <S%G4816><s%> out of his kingdom <S%G932><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things that offend, <S%G4625><s%> and them which do <S%G4160><s%> iniquity; <S%G458><s%>

And shall cast <S%G906><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> a furnace <S%G2575><s%> of fire: <S%G4442><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be wailing <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the righteous <S%G1342><s%> shine <S%G1584><s%> forth <S%G1584><s%> as the sun <S%G2246><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of their Father. <S%G3962><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to treasure <S%G2344><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> in a field; <S%G68><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> when a man <S%G444><s%> has found, <S%G2147><s%> he hides, <S%G2928><s%> and for joy <S%G5479><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> goes <S%G5217><s%> and sells <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that he has, <S%G2192><s%> and buys <S%G59><s%> that field. <S%G68><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to a merchant <S%G1713><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> goodly <S%G2573><s%> pearls: <S%G3135><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> when he had found <S%G2147><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> pearl <S%G3135><s%> of great <S%G4186><s%> price, <S%G4186><s%> went <S%G565><s%> and sold <S%G4097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that he had, <S%G2192><s%> and bought <S%G59><s%> it.

Again, <S%G3825><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to a net, <S%G4522><s%> that was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and gathered <S%G4863><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> kind: <S%G1085><s%>

Which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> it was full, <S%G4137><s%> they drew <S%G307><s%> to shore, <S%G123><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> down, <S%G2523><s%> and gathered <S%G4816><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> vessels, <S%G30><s%> but cast <S%G906><s%> the bad <S%G4550><s%> away. <S%G1854><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> shall it be at <S%G1722><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world: <S%G165><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> shall come <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and sever <S%G873><s%> the wicked <S%G4190><s%> from among <S%G3319><s%> the just, <S%G1342><s%>

And shall cast <S%G906><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the furnace <S%G2575><s%> of fire: <S%G4442><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be wailing <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Have you understood <S%G4920><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things? They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he to them, Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%> which is instructed <S%G3100><s%> to the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to a man <S%G444><s%> that is an householder, <S%G3617><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> out of his treasure <S%G2344><s%> things new <S%G2537><s%> and old. <S%G3820><s%>
And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> parables, <S%G3850><s%> he departed <S%G3332><s%> there. <S%G1564><s%>

And when he was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his own country, <S%G3968><s%> he taught <S%G1321><s%> them in their synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they were astonished, <S%G1605><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> From where <S%G4159><s%> has this <S%G3778><s%> man this <S%G3778><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> and these <S%G3588><s%> mighty <S%G1411><s%> works?
